verses.name: Jeremiah 15:13
verses.text: Thy substance and thy treasures will I give to the spoil without price, and that for all thy sins, even in all thy borders.

verses.name: Jeremiah 15:14
verses.text: And I will make thee to pass with thine enemies into a land which thou knowest not: for a fire is kindled in mine anger, which shall burn upon you.

verses.name: Jeremiah 15:15
verses.text: O Lord, thou knowest: remember me, and visit me, and revenge me of my persecutors; take me not away in thy longsuffering: know that for thy sake I have suffered rebuke.
